*.swp
*~

# If you ever introduce a build step (e.g., with Vite, Create React App)
# dist/
# build/
# .parcel-cache/
# .vite/

# If you decide to use a local .env file for development to simulate process.env variables
# (Your current setup assumes process.env.API_KEY is pre-configured in the execution environment)
# .env
# .env.*
# !.env.example

# Log files
logs
